column8:
The Silence Of The Lambs (1991) directed by Jonathan Demme and stars Jodie Foster & Anthony Hopkins.

Brilliant directing & acting won the film 5 Academy Awards: Best Picture, Best Actress, Best Actor, Best Director and Best Screenplay.

One of the best psychological thriller movies ever made.
